node.title: Did common eye drops lead to a SC man's homicide?
node.description: After a millionaire is poisoned with eye drops, his death is ruled a homicide. Did this inspire a copycat crime?
node.content: ["After a millionaire is poisoned with eye drops, his death is ruled a homicide. Did this inspire a copycat crime? \"48 Hours\" investigates in \"The Eye Drop Homicide\" airing Saturday, March 12 at 9/8c on CBS.", "Lana and Steve Clayton had been married for five years, and were living in Lake Wylie, S.C. According to Steve's family they had a loving marriage.\u00a0"]
